title: Unwrap panic on stable in def_path_hash_to_def_id in OnDiskCache

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code There's a lot of code in my project. I can't readily produce a minimal example. However, it was compiling fine then I renamed one type and got this error consistently. Changing the name of the type back to the original fixed the problem. Changing back to the new type name - the problem came back. I ran `cargo clean` and that fixed it - even with the new type name. ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.57.0 (f1edd0429 2021-11-29) binary: rustc commit-hash: f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c commit-date: 2021-11-29 host: aarch64-apple-darwin release: 1.57.0 LLVM version: 13.0.0 ``` I would try it on nightly, but I've run `cargo clean` so the problem has now gone. ### Error output ``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', /rustc/f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c/compiler/rustc_hir/src/definitions.rs:452:14 ```
Backtrace

``` thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', /rustc/f1edd0429582dd29cccacaf50fd134b05593bd9c/compiler/rustc_hir/src/definitions.rs:452:14 stack backtrace: 0: _rust_begin_unwind 1: core::panicking::panic_fat 2: core::panicking::panic 3: ::def_path_hash_to_def_id 4: rustc_middle::dep_graph::dep_node:: for rustc_span::def_id::LocalDefId>::recover 5: rustc_query_impl::query_callbacks::hir_owner::force_from_dep_node 6: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_previous_green 7: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_previous_green 8: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::try_mark_green 9: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::ensure_must_run 10: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query 11: as core::ops::function::FnOnce<()>>::call_once 12: rustc_data_structures::sync::par_for_each_in 13: rustc_session::utils::::time 14: rustc_interface::passes::analysis 15: rustc_query_system::dep_graph::graph::DepGraph::with_task 16: rustc_data_structures::stack::ensure_sufficient_stack 17: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::try_execute_query 18: rustc_query_system::query::plumbing::get_query 19: rustc_interface::passes::QueryContext::enter 20: rustc_interface::queries::::enter 21: rustc_span::with_source_map 22: scoped_tls::ScopedKey::set ```
